1.0.name: wordpress/bp-group-documents
1.0.description:
Original plugin is no longer supported so revised.

BP Group Documents creates a page within each BuddyPress group to upload and any type of file or document. This allows members of BuddyPress groups to upload and store files and documents that are relevant to the group.

Documents can be edited and deleted either by the document owner or by the group administrator. Categories can be used to organize documents. Activity is logged in the main activity stream, and is also tied to the user and group activity streams. The site administrator can set filters on file extensions, set display options, and upload files via FTP. Group members and moderators can receive email notifications at their option.
